School Scrap Scout!

At the end of the day, when the trash is full,
you will list every item in that can!

Knowledge is power, so start listing!
Remember you want to count EVERYTHING!
There is no maximum but you MUST list
at least 15 items.

Scrap Scout Hints

Compost = Organic Matter

Donate = Good for Somebody Else

Trash = Useless Stuff

Recycle = Reuse or Make New

You will sort into categories
determine if there could be better
ways to dispose of these items
so that they don't end up in landfills.

Stuff nobody wants.
Trash has little or no value and
can't be used to make
anything else.

Anything that can
be used again or
deconstructed to make
something new.

Organic matter
(which means it was once alive)
that has decayed and
is used as plant ferilizer.

You might no longer want
something but it could be
an item someone else could use.
